list_definition.definition: to separate and go in different directions

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The roads diverge three kilometres/kilometers further on.

list_definition.definition: to differ (from someone or something else); to go away (from a standard)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: This is where our opinions diverge.
